description: A service is any software application that can run on instances containers, or serverless functions within an account or virtual private cloud (VPC).

DomainName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

HostedZoneId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

DnsEntry.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AuthType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NONE | AWS_IAM  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 40  
Pattern: ^(?!svc-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

CertificateArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^(arn(:[a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*){2}(:([a-z0-9]+([.-][a-z0-9]+)*)?){2}:certificate/[0-9a-z-]+)?$  
Update requires: No interruption

CustomDomainName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:service/svc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

CreatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 21  
Maximum Length: 21  
Pattern: ^svc-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption

LastUpdatedAt.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ACTIVE | CREATE_IN_PROGRESS | DELETE_IN_PROGRESS | CREATE_FAILED | DELETE_FAILED  
Update requires: No interruption
